module.p:
an impis can be used to mark prospective aspect about to, on the verge/point of –
Tha iad an impis a dhol ann. They are on the verge/point of going.

Intransitive examples –
Bha sinn an impis ruith air adhart nuair a stad Lachlainn mar gum buaileadh am peilear e.
about to run off ?? td. 419
Fhuair an nighean bhochd a bha an impis a dol á cochall a cridhe leis an eagal, gu tèaruinte dhachaidh gu bhith toirt a beannachd cho fad ’s bu bheò i airsan a theasairg i.
about to go from ... ?? td. 212
Bha mi dìreach an impis éirigh agus a dhol dhachaidh, nuair a chuala mi grùsdaich am bad-eigin.
I was about to get up and go home ... td. 271
Tha e furasda gu leòir dhoibh iarraidh oirnn ar n-eanchainnean a chur air ghleus – Moire, tha mo chlaigeann truagh fhéin an impis sgàinidh mar tha, ’s is faoin domh bhi ’ga sgròbadh.
my skull is about to burst ... ?? td. 136 The verbal noun is in the genitive here.
an impis falbh
about to leave/go td. 22
Bha i an impis dol fodha.
She was on the point of sinking / about to sink. td. 356
an impis teicheadh
on the eve of scampering td. 541
an impis a bhi sgàinte
like to burst td. 541

Transitive examples with inversion –
Bha e an ìmpis an dorus a bhristeadh asteach roimhe anuair a dh’fhosgail boireannach mór ruadh e agus thug i rabhadh is àithne dha a theicheadh le bheatha mun tigeadh a bràithrean dhachaidh.
He was about to break into the door ... td. 106
Chaidh deich thaighean tomadach snasail a thogail as ùr o chionn ghoirid, agus thathar an impis sia eile thogail an dràsda.
... six others are about to be built ... td. 131
’S ann a bha e spìonadh na luibhean grannda, gun fheum a bha an impis an tuirneip agus mùiran-buidhe [sic!] a thachdadh.
... about to ... ?? td. 43
an impis an dùthaich fhàgail
on the point of leaving the country td. 22
an impis a chiall a chall
almost losing his reason td. 541

Transitive examples with possessive determiners –
Bha ’ghaoth a bha e tarruinn an impis mo thilgeadh dheth, ach bha mo dheich iongan an greim-bais ris a’ roth, ’s gun mi faighinn m’ anail ach le riasladh.
The wind (= turbulence) that it (= the car) was creating nearly threw me of it ... td. 16
A thaobh fuinn nan salm tha eagal air gu bheil dòighean ùra an ìmpis am milleadh.
... about to destroy them ?? td. 380
Cha e mhàin gun cluinnear manadh leis a’ chluais, ach fairichear e leis a’ bhiodaig cuideachd. Tha cuimhne agam air boireannach a bhith ag innse dhomh uair gun do dh’fhairich i is i anns an leabaidh, cudthrom anabarrach a’ tighinn oirre a bha an impis a mort. Mhair e mu thuaiream trì mionaidean, ’s an sin, thog e dhith.
... about to kill her ?? td. 88
Bha na tonnan an impis an slugadh.
The waves were on the point of engulfing them. td. 356
Other forms – an imfhios, an imis.
cf. Other markers of prospective aspect – gu(s), air lunn, air bheul, air thuar (evidential).
